title: Phillips Oval Head Sheet Metal Screws 18-8 Stainless Steel - #8 x 1-1/4" Qty-100
features: Phillips oval head sheet metal screws feature a raised decorative head, with a countersunk bottom and a round top.

Sheet metal screws have sharp cutting threads that cut into sheet metal, plastic or wood. They are sometimes notched (Type-17 Point) at the tip to aid in chip removal during thread cutting. The shanks are threaded up to the head or to the undercut.

These screws come in many types of heads, pan, flat, truss, oval, etc. Sheet metal screws make excellent fasteners for attaching metal hardware to wood because the fully threaded shank provides good retention in wood.
Oval head sheet metal screws in this selection range in sizes from #4 up to #14 in various lengths.
18-8 Stainless steel Phillips oval head sheet metal screws are rust resistant. 18-8 stainless steel is the industry standard
